did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Family and Consumer Sciences administrators study records, 1995-1996.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Surveys from a study of careers in Family and Consumer Sciences conducted by E. Audrey Clark. The study results were discussed in an article in the January 2000 edition of the Journal of Family and Consumer Sciences.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Surveys from a study of careers in Family and Consumer Sciences conducted by E. Audrey Clark. The study results were discussed in an article in the January 2000 edition of the Journal of Family and Consumer Sciences.
